name: He Always Wins!
Lore: 'Sebulba is willing to utilize a variety of ''tactics'' to maintain his lead position. Mars Guo learned this lesson the hard way.',
Text: 'Deploy on a Junkyard. If a podrace was just initiated, you may draw two cards from Reserve Deck. May deploy Sebulba or Tatooine System from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. If you have won a podrace, your total power during battle is + 3 and ''Free'' on You''re a Slave? may be treated as ''2 Force''. (Immune to Alter).',
